a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of population subjected to sexual assault, male vs. female, 2022
Includes only people who were victims of sexual assault in the last 12 months and reported this to relevant
authorities. Sexual assault includes rape and other physical assault, but excludes non-physical forms such as

text.textPath: Men are twice as likely to be assaulted
Men are twice as likely to be assaulted
Women are twice as likely to be assaulted
Women are twice as likely to be assaulted
Women are ten times as likely to be assaulted
Women are ten times as likely to be assaulted

text.tspan: Data source: United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime
